WRITING.TITLE: Orson Welles infamous recording of the "frozen peas" commercial
Alfred Hitchcock explains the Kuleshov effect (1m18s)
A short educational film from 1946 teaching children how to research superstitions and other questions that they might have with scientific experiment. (video)

WRITING.TEXT:
Four drones are tested, each carrying a 2,000 pound bomb, they are controlled by pilots in seperate aircraft watching through a camera on the drone.
Bombing tests begin at 04:43
I came across this accidentally on archive.org, there is a more detailed historical analysis in the video description, and of course if anyone knows more, do tell :)

WRITING.TITLE: The U.S. Navy had drones in 1944, they tested them in the South Pacific by attaching bombs and crashing them into derelict ships. (video)
